content: Remember that you are not small. You are pure and light. Will you not behave in accordance with your nature ?
Man is the master of his own destiny. If one can change his thinking process, he or she can control the circumstances.
Do not do unto others that, which you would dislike to be done unto you.
The test of anybody's greatness is what he thinks and does for one who is lower than him.
Do not treat the people, the way you would not like people to treat you.
